element.name: folderGeneralTab
element.styleClass: .nav-tabs > li.active > a, .nav-tabs > li.active > a:hover, .nav-tabs > li.active > a:focus

element.name: tr_listCell
element.styleClass: .table > thead > tr > th.listHeader, .table > tbody > tr > th.listHeader, .table > tfoot > tr > th.listHeader, .table > thead > tr.listRow > td, .table > tbody > tr.listRow > td, .table > tfoot > tr.listRow > td

element.name: .calendar_table.table-bordered
element.styleClass: .calendar_table.table-bordered > tbody > tr > td, .calendar_table.table-bordered > tbody > tr > th
